Reviews.Title: Amazing Clarity and Crispness
Reviews.Author: Eric J. Koenig
Reviews.Content: I have been using Canon's for years, my latest being the Rebel T3, and decided to take this step because of the price. I am so glad that i did. I have never had a camera with such clarity and speed at the same time.  I take a lot of pictures of sunsets and i was blown away when the Jet trails in the sky showed up so clearly.  There is a lot of flexibility with this camera for professionals and for those who are just learning.  This kit came with everything i need to get quality pictures. I would recommend this camera to anyone that is ready to take the next step in their photography!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Lena Campbell
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning, but so far this camera is awesome. I've just been playing around with it, taking pictures of my grandson, niece and nephew. The picture clarity is amazing. The camera is so easy to use. I also bought the remote and can't wait to try it out. So far, it gets 5 stars from me.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mikie
Reviews.Content: Really good package for the price.  The camera took a little getting used to but it was worth the time.  Takes exceptional pictures.  The package is well worth the price and yes i said it again.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy P. Davis
Reviews.Content: So far so Great with this camera, does everything you want to do , easy and was a great buy with this kit, Love that it is not to heavy with the big lens on

Reviews.Title: Nikon d3200 Deal
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my new camera and all the assessories. I cant wait for spring so i can really get our in nature and take lots more pictures. I'm really glad i chose to get the 2 lense deal. I have used the tripod let but will very soon.  I have a few projects coming up and i look forward to using my camera and assessories.

Reviews.Title: Nature Pictures
Reviews.Author: Sonya Brand
Reviews.Content: After my granddaughter came out to get me started on this camera I find I really like it.  There are a few things I have to learn to use, but my original idea was to shoot with a camera rather than the guns I had been using.  Seems like I have lost my interest in "shooting from the hip" and hope to make my time in the woods A-OK for me.  The boys can hunt and I will hunt for neat pictures with my camera.  I have to admit I was scared to touch it because I am use to a PHD camera (Push here dummy) this one will take a bit to learn the in's and outs of and I am still scared of it.  Hopefully I will get over that part.

Reviews.Title: great starter kit
Reviews.Author: Jeff57
Reviews.Content: All ways had 35mms film, it's been many years scene using. Now with a new granddaughter I wanted to get back into photography. It a great starter for learning digital photography. Also purchased a nikon d7100.

Reviews.Title: Best Photography Kit
Reviews.Author: Naquan Smith
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to start off with her photography hobby. And she loves it. Best kit for the price. Which in stores the camera by itself was the same price as the kit

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera
Reviews.Author: SgtMcC
Reviews.Content: You can begin taking great photos right out of the box. Of course reading the manual and frequent use will result in much better quality.The seller was very responsive and ensured that all was satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Much easier to use than I thought.  I still have a lot to learn, but I can set the camera to auto and take pictures that are much nicer than any camera I've ever owned!  And, I picked up Nikon 3200 for Dummies and am going through chapter by chapter just to get familiar with the camera.  I think it was a great deal for the price and would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Everything I Hoped for in a Dslr
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: This camera is phenomenal! From the quality of the photos, to the endless amount of settings.. This camera can do it all! I highly recommend the Nikon D3200!!

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Martin
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. The lens work well and it is a good start for some one with limited camera experience like my self.

Reviews.Title: Everything as pictured
Reviews.Author: Adrilee4
Reviews.Content: I received everything as advertised.  It's a great deal with many parts.  It is a gift and I havent given it to the recipient yet but I am sure she will love everything about it

Reviews.Title: Great bundle deal!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this kit.  The camera is awesome and all the items included get you on your way to the photography world.  After my sister saw mine she bought one too.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: unknown
Reviews.Content: Super fast shipping.  Love the camera I still have a lot to learn with it.  Had everything needed to start using the camera

Reviews.Title: Works like it's suppose to
Reviews.Author: duramax829
Reviews.Content: Works like it's suppose to. 33 Street Camera was very helpful with damaged goods from shipping. The camera was fine but the tripod was broken. No questions asked shipped replacement the same day. I would order from 33 Street Camera again. I received my product when it was supposed to. Ready for the holidays.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body (Red) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens (Black) - Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor - 52mm UV Protector Filter
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL14 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Red) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Lens and Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor + EN-EL14 Battery + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
